title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.5 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.5 - Subpoenas

State Regulations
(a) Subpoenas in
connection with an adjudicatory proceeding may be issued by: (1)
the Superintendent, (2)
a Deputy Superintendent, (3)
the hearing officer assigned to hear the
matter, or
(4)
any employee of the

Department authorized by the Superintendent to issue a subpoena in their
discretion at the request of any party to the proceeding. (b) The party requesting the subpoena shall
be responsible for serving the subpoena and payment of all required fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
2.5

Adopted

New

York State Register March 25, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 12, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
